1406400.name: Fantasy Grounds - Hobgoblin Invasion!
1406400.description:
Hobgoblin Invasion!

A pack filled with Hobgoblins with different looks and weapons.

This product includes:
  • Hobgoblin_Blue_Ninja01
  • Hobgoblin_Blue_Ninja02
  • Hobgoblin_Blue_Ninja03
  • Hobgoblin_Blue_Ninja04
  • Hobgoblin_Green_Alchemist01
  • Hobgoblin_Green_Alchemist02
  • Hobgoblin_Green_Alchemist03
  • Hobgoblin_Green_Alchemist04
  • Hobgoblin_Grey_WarriorMonk01
  • Hobgoblin_Grey_WarriorMonk02
  • Hobgoblin_Grey_WarriorMonk03
  • Hobgoblin_Grey_WarriorMonk04
  • Hobgoblin_Pink_Fighter01
  • Hobgoblin_Pink_Fighter02
  • Hobgoblin_Pink_Fighter03
  • Hobgoblin_Pink_Fighter04
  • Hobgoblin_Purple_Skirmisher01
  • Hobgoblin_Purple_Skirmisher02
  • Hobgoblin_Purple_Skirmisher03
  • Hobgoblin_Purple_Skirmisher04
  • Hobgoblin_Yellow_Samurai01
  • Hobgoblin_Yellow_Samurai02
  • Hobgoblin_Yellow_Samurai03
  • Hobgoblin_Yellow_Samurai04
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Kevin Doswell
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset. Compatible with Fantasy Grounds Unity
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
